name: Freak Fortress 2
tagline: Freak Fortress 2 is a one versus everyone mod for Team Fortress 2.  It is the successor to the Vs. Saxton Hale mode.
body:
## Welcome to the official FF2 webpage! [![Build Status](http://ff2.50dkp.com/jenkins/buildStatus/icon?job=FF2)](http://ff2.50dkp.com/jenkins/job/FF2/)

Freak Fortress 2 is a one-versus-all plugin designed for the popular game [Team Fortress 2](http://www.teamfortress.com/).  Developed as a more customizable version of Versus Saxton Hale, its precursor, FF2 allows anyone to easily create their own bosses.


Want the latest version?  Check out the [Releases](https://github.com/50DKP/FF2-Official/releases) page.  For those who always want the latest bleeding-edge features (and bugs), development builds are available on [Jenkins](http://ff2.50dkp.com/jenkins/job/FF2/).  You can also check out the [forums](https://forums.alliedmods.net/forumdisplay.php?f=154) to learn more.  Brought to you by [50DKP](http://www.50dkp.com).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
